overall.description: The differences between consecutive elements of an array.

ary.description: If necessary, will be flattened before the differences are taken.

to_end.description: Number(s) to append at the end of the returned differences.

to_begin.description: Number(s) to prepend at the beginning of the returned differences.

ediff1d.description: The differences. Loosely, this is ary.flat[1:] - ary.flat[:-1].

note: When applied to masked arrays, this function drops the mask information if the to_begin and/or to_end parameters are used. '
